items.title: Anker’s 72-hour SOLIX flash sale drops C2000 Gen 2 power station to $779 ($719 off) + up to 48% off other new models
items.summary:
Anker SOLIX has extended its Winter Power Deals sale, which also now includes a 72-hour flash sale that is taking up to $2,300 off three of its newest power station models alongside an expansion battery for the most modular of these portable options. The mid-tier option in this lineup is Anker’s SOLIX C2000 Gen 2 Portable Power Station at $779 shipped, and you’ll get a free tote bag, which also matches the pricing over at the brand’s Amazon storefront (without the bag). You may notice a $1,498 MSRP, but it’s only really climbed as high as $850 at Amazon over the first two months of 2026, with a single spike up to its MSRP that we saw in mid-January. While the price has gone a little lower in the past, with the all-time low having last appeared in November, you’re still getting a solid 48% markdown here that cuts $719 off the tag for the third-best price we have tracked – just $100 above the Black Friday low. You can learn more about this model in our hands-on review here, or head below where the other flash offers are also located for your perusal.

more…

items.title: Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen now officially live on eShop for Switch and Switch 2
items.summary:
Nintendo officially kicked off the 2026 Pokémon Day festivities last week by announcing the launch of Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen on Switch consoles. Now, a week after that announcement went live, they are now live on the Nintendo eShop. You can head to this link right here and load it up on your Switch or Switch 2.

Pokémon FireRed Version Switch $20
Pokémon LeafGreen Version Switch $20

items.title: Best Buy flash sale takes $100 off Samsung’s thin and light Galaxy Chromebook Plus today
items.summary:
As part of its now live flash sale, Best Buy is offering Samsung’s Galaxy Chromebook Plus notebook for $599.99 shipped. This model originally launched at $700, briefly climbed to $750, and has since settled back at its $700 price. Today’s deal shaves $100 off its usual going rate to mark one of the lowest prices we have tracked for it to date. This model dropped to $550 during the Black Friday sale last year, and it’s now within just $50 of that all-time low. Samsung is matching Best Buy’s price today directly at its online store, so be sure to snag it after getting more details below.

items.title: OpenAI raised $110B at a $730B pre-money valuation, up from $500B in a secondary financing in Oct.; Amazon invested $50B, Nvidia and SoftBank invested $30B each (CNBC)
items.summary:
CNBC:
OpenAI raised $110B at a $730B pre-money valuation, up from $500B in a secondary financing in Oct.; Amazon invested $50B, Nvidia and SoftBank invested $30B each  —  OpenAI has closed a $110 billion funding round, a financing that's more than double the size of its last raise a year ago, which was a record for a private tech company.

items.title: Save $470 on Acer’s Intel-powered Swift 16 AI touchscreen 3K OLED 120Hz Copilot+ PC while it’s down to $780 (All-time low)
items.summary:
As part of its now live flash sale, Best Buy is offering Acer’s Swift 16 AI Copilot+ laptop down at $799.99 shipped. This is regularly a $1,250 notebook, which is now seeing a solid $470 discount. Unlike the Snapdragon X Elite-powered 14-inch Swift model that sees frequent price drops, this 16-inch variant with Intel’s Lunar Lake chip doesn’t go on sale nearly as often. Only once before today have we seen this laptop see a notable discount, and today’s deal lands it $20 below that price to mark a new best price to beat. It’s a pretty good option to consider if you’re after a reliable 16-inch laptop for everyday use, and you can learn more details below.

Originally priced at $3,000, this massive gaming monitor has more recently been hovering around $2,700 at Amazon. Today’s deal at Woot slashes a huge $1,500 off its usual price, dropping it $500 below the price it’s currently fetching directly at Samsung. This monitor is now back to the lowest price we tracked for it last month when it briefly hit this price as part of Woot’s daily deals offer, be sure to snag it now in case you missed it last time.

[UPDATE: 17:38pm] The login issue affecting WhatsApp’s Linked Devices feature appears to have been resolved. We can confirm this on our end, as we are now able to log into companion devices as well as WhatsApp Web without any problems. Despite this, we have yet to receive an official response from WhatsApp or Meta regarding the […]

items.title: Security researchers detail AirSnitch, a series of attacks that bypass Wi-Fi client isolation, enabling machine-in-the-middle attacks in modern Wi-Fi networks (Dan Goodin/Ars Technica)
items.summary:
Dan Goodin / Ars Technica:
Security researchers detail AirSnitch, a series of attacks that bypass Wi-Fi client isolation, enabling machine-in-the-middle attacks in modern Wi-Fi networks  —  That guest network you set up for your neighbors may not be as secure as you think.  —  It's hard to overstate the role that Wi-Fi plays in virtually every facet of life.

items.title: New LEGO Eevee, Pikachu, Venusaur, Charizard, and Blastoise now live for Pokémon Day 2026: Catch ’em all starting from $60
items.summary:
It’s officially February 27, 2026, which means today is a celebration of all things Pokémon! It’s been 30 years since the release of the first-gen Pokémon Red and Blue games that began the entire franchise and became a global phenomenon. Amongst the new game releases, an official pinball machine, and more – LEGO is stirring up quite the buzz as the first of its three new Pokémon sets are hitting shelves, complete with two GWP sets, too. You can get a rundown on these three sets that fans have eagerly been waiting for below.
